pageContext.claim: “[Harris] wants to raise taxes. She wants to get rid of your Second Amendment, no guns for protection, no nothing. She is very strong on the Second Amendment, getting rid of it, and very bad to the military. She wants to cut the military. She wants to cut spending for the military and the vets. And, you know, I don't quite get the choice.”
pageContext.analysis: Sen. Kamala Harris (D-Calif.) does not oppose the Second Amendment nor does she want to strip funding from veterans programs.
